timeline.bachGrad: Graduated from: Tokyo University of Science, Faculty of Materials Science
timeline.bachTopic: Research topic: Feature extraction using persistent homology in spinodal decomposition
timeline.bachText: This study showed the potential of more efficient experiments by extracting features from microscope images.
timeline.masGrad: Graduated from: Tokyo Institute of Technology, Faculty of Materials Science
timeline.masTopic: Research topic: Exploration of green-light emitting semiconductors using computational materials database and machine learning
timeline.masText: This study showed the potential of accelerating development in Materials Science by using Bayesian Optimization.
timeline.compText1: Design and operation of migration services for shipping industry from on-premises to cloud (AWS).
timeline.compText2: Completed a project to improve working environment as a leader of the same period co-worker.
